concept.title: VPN Server
concept.shortdesc: VPN Server provides flexible VPN solutions for small and medium company which does not set up a VPN network for whole company. With VPN connection, you can set up multiple VPN clients to access safely and securely wherever and whenever.

ul.li: VPN Sever App is supported on version 30.2.0.8 or later.

section.title: About This Guide
section.p: This guide is intended to help you to set up the VPN server, and connect server via OpenVPN with the following clients:
